about_the_game:
Activate an interdimensional satellite, iDGi-1, to inhabit the mind of a newly commissioned officer in the Consortium—a supposed peacekeeping force dedicated to promoting global unity and safeguarding Earth’s environment in a uniquely bright vision of humanity’s future.

Welcome to VR Interactive Cinema: As Bishop Six, you will be tasked to investigate and attempt to solve a cryptic murder, defend the crew from an outlandish attack, uncover hidden conspiracies, and navigate complex interpersonal relationships. Featuring an interactive narrative with branching dialogue and alignment systems that allow you to influence the story's direction, offering a richly detailed world that explores the consequences of your decisions and the nature of trust and loyalty.

  • Introducing V.O.I.C.E.: Choose to use your own voice—or not—to interact with twenty fully realized characters aboard the Consortium Command vessel, C-3800-D “Zenlil.”

    [*Navigate a nuanced and highly replayable 6-10 hour campaign. Choose diplomacy without ever drawing a weapon, or take a more aggressive route when you can, ultimately shaping the public’s perception of you. What kind of Bishop will you become? This chart outlines one possible path among many one can take through the story.

  • The world of Consortium is very different from our own. Discover how different and why with the in-game "Information Console," containing hundreds of documents and AI-generated images organized by politics/culture, science/tech, space exploration, general history, and Consortium operations.

  • Manage a variety of weapons, equipment and features through interactive screens embedded in your virtual arms.

  • Craving more FPS action? Explore diverse VR gameplay scenarios in the Virtual Trainer (VT) or create your own with our VR-focused VT editor. Share your levels worldwide with our integrated modding support.

What Makes This A Remaster?

  • Full port to a modern game engine allowed for substantial bug fixes, graphics and performance improvements.

  • Redesigned the entire user interface from the ground up to work intuitively in VR

  • A completely new ending after years of feedback and hindsight, including a brand new conversation with the Consortium King.

  • Months of polish to choreography and dialogue options while integrating V.O.I.C.E. (see above)

  • Complete remake of the “Zenlil Defence Minigame”

  • Overhaul of the Virtual Trainer + several more levels to explore, integrated mod support and a leaderboard system.

  • Multiple editing/polish passes on all documents inside the Information Console (including nearly 100 new ones!) + the addition of nearly two hundred AI-generated images.

  • Additional language support (German and French to start with).

Welcome to the Consortium.

content_descriptors.notes: While this is generally frowned upon by characters in the game, players have the freedom to be able to shoot and kill human NPCs with futuristic weapons.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / AMD R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR supported, motion controllers required.
  • Additional Notes: For V.O.I.C.E support: Microphone required. No internet connection required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: You are Consortium Bishop Six, a celebrity peacekeeper in the year 2042. Choose to speak out loud using your own voice to shape relationships and navigate the story. Experience a VR murder mystery thriller aboard a futuristic aircraft with a narrative twist. Every choice counts.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Spanish - Latin America, French
*languages with full audio support
